title: Shoujo Kakumei Utena: Adolescence Mokushiroku
original_name: 少女革命ウテナ ～アドゥレセンス黙示録
sinopse: Utena Tenjou arrives at Ohtori Academy, only to be immediately swept up in a series of duels for the hand of her classmate Anthy Himemiya and the power she supposedly holds. At the same time, Utena reunites with Touga Kiryuu, a friend from her childhood who seems to know the secrets behind the duels.
